Class - XPSPL\Listener¶

Listener

Added in v2.0.0

The listener allows for registering a class into the processor establishing handles for each publicly defined method names.

Methods¶

__construct¶

__construct()¶

Constructs the listener.

Return type:void

_get_signals¶

_get_signals()¶

Returns the sig handlers for this listener.

Return type:array

_reset¶

_reset()¶

Resets the object.

Return type:void
